Package com.dextra.challenge.makemagic.service

Interface CharacterService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CharacterServiceImpl
    public interface CharacterService
    The Character Service.

    This interface define the methods responsible to CRUD operations and their responses.

    Author:
    oruam

    • Method Detail

      • getAllCharacters

        java.util.List<CharacterResponseDTO> getAllCharacters​(java.lang.String house)
        Responsible for getting all characters or all characters based on the house id
        Parameters:
        house - is used to recovery all character with this field value.
        Returns:
        a list of characters dto objects.

      • getById

        CharacterResponseDTO getById​(java.lang.Long id)
        Responsible for getting the character based on his database id.
        Parameters:
        id - used to filter the search on the database.
        Returns:
        a character dto object.

      • createCharacter

        CharacterResponseDTO createCharacter​(CharacterRequestDTO dto)
        Responsible for create a character object on the database.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        a character dto object.

      • updateCharacter

        CharacterResponseDTO updateCharacter​(CharacterRequestDTO dto,
                                     java.lang.Long id)
        Responsible for update de character information based on his database id.
        Parameters:
        dto - object that represents the character domain.
        id - value to search the registry on the database.
        Returns:
        a character dto object.

      • deleteCharacter

        void deleteCharacter​(java.lang.Long id)
        Responsible for remove the registry on the database.
        Parameters:
        id - id value to search the registry on the database.
